markdownRemark.html:
Welcome to my new home on the web!

If you don't know who I am, I'm Jordan. A software engineer who took a year off to work on a media company.

Unfortunately that effort did not take off the way I wanted it to. So now I'm back on the job market and need to brush off my engineering skills.

Which has led me to relaunching my blog.

Here you'll find short posts covering topics related to software engineering and product development. All geared to help you learn and showcase my skillset.

Welcome to the journey.
